The provided code chunk is part of an initialization method in a class responsible for inspecting Finite State Machines (FSMs). The chunk specifically handles the creation of a popup menu for states, allowing users to request transitions or inspect submachines if applicable. This functionality is integrated with other state visualization and interaction features within the GUI framework.

# The Popup State Menu
        self._popupMenu = tk.Menu(self._canvas, tearoff = 0)
        self._popupMenu.add_command(label = 'Request transition to ' +
                                    state.getName(),
                                    command = self.transitionTo)
        if state.hasChildren():
            self._popupMenu.add_command(label = 'Inspect ' + state.getName() +
                                        ' submachine',
                                        command = self.inspectSubMachine)

        self.scrolledCanvas.resizescrollregion()
